Paragraph: CONCLUSIONS : Based on the results , S - 53482 and S - 23121 were teratogenic when administered dermally to pregnant rats as were the compounds administered orally .

In the given paragraph, the term "teratogenic" is the only disease-related entity. Teratogenic refers to a substance or factor that can cause malformations or birth defects in an embryo or fetus when administered during pregnancy.
